page.title: 05FARMING IN OLDBURY
page.content: Around Oldbury on Severn there are about 15 farms. Most of the farms are dairy farms. They range in size from about 30 acres to 200 acres. Nearly all the farms have fresian cows, some of the farmers make silage and hay for animal feeding during the winter and straw for bedding. On my father's farm we have 45 acres of land. We have 1 cow and calf, and 1 Cow in calf. We also have 22 Hereford Heifers and 3 Jersey calves. We send our cattle to Chippenham Market. I Like going to the Market with my parents.
